actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Thurmond with an amendment. With written report No. 99-319.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 678.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An Act granting a charter to the General Federation of Women's Clubs".

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, S. Rept. 99-319) Amends the Federal charter of the General Federation of Women's Clubs to limit the Federation's operation to charitable and educational purposes within the meaning of a tax-exempt organization under the Internal Revenue Code. Requires the Federation, upon dissolution, to liquidate and distribute its assets to tax-exempt charitable organizations with similar purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An Act granting a charter to the General Federation of Women's Clubs".
